Text:
The current version is 1.0.11 and comes with a free DLC package containing new skills. Check the forums at gaslamp games. Any search will tell you where it is.

This torrent is useless.

@OmniNegro

Many , like me, don't have the steam version , and while i searched (and noticed your post at http://community.gaslampgames.com/threads/yhtntep-without-steam.3571/) i couldn't make your dlc work. It says that some file is missing. This is a complete packed version of the game, so until someone puts a complete packed version of 1.0.11 (with both expansions) i wouldn't say its useless.

This version cannot use the new DLC at all. But I will not bother to try talking you out of pirating the game. I just hope you realize how good it is and choose to buy a copy eventually.

Enjoy in the meantime.

Can we get a mac compatible clone of this?
I'd certainly appreciate it.
